name: OutSystems Application Package
summary: An OAP file is an application package created by Service Studio, an IDE used to deploy enterprise web and mobile apps for the OutSystems Platform. It is compressed with Zip-compression and contains a manifest file that describes the package contents and a directory with all of the modules and extensions that make up an application. OAP files are typically used to share an application with other OutSystems users for collaboration purposes.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
